TOP 0.2.3

Reference

All functions

add_chip_peak_labels_to_sites()

Add ChIP-seq peak labels to the candidate sites

add_chip_signals_to_sites()

Add ChIP-seq signals to the candidate sites

assemble_partition_training_data()

Assemble TOP training data for all TF x cell type combos in a selected partition

assemble_training_data()

Assemble TOP training data for all TF x cell type combos, then split training data into 10 partitions

bam_sort_index_stats()

Sort and index the BAM file, and retrieve the idxstats.

bin_transform_counts()

Bin and transform count matrix

combine_TOP_samples()

Combine and take the average of TOP posterior samples from all partitions

count_genome_cuts()

Count DNase-seq or ATAC-seq cuts along the genome

count_normalize_chip()

Count and normalize (and transform) ChIP-seq read coverage

extract_TOP_coef_samples()

Extract alpha and beta coefficients from TOP posterior samples

extract_TOP_mean_coef()

Extract the posterior mean coefficients for each level of TOP model

filter_blacklist()

Filter candidate sites in blacklist regions

filter_mapability()

Filter candidate sites by mapability

fimo_motif_matches()

Run FIMO to scan for motif matches

fit_TOP_M5_model()

Fit TOP model

fit_TOP_M5_model_jags()

Fit TOP quantitative occupancy model with M5 bins

fit_TOP_logistic_M5_model_jags()

Fit TOP logistic model with M5 DNase (or ATAC) bins and binary ChIP labels.

flank_fimo_sites()

Get candidate sites using FIMO motifs with flanking regions

flip_rev_strand_counts()

Flip the counts generated from bwtool for motifs on the reverse strand

get_sites_counts()

Get count matrices around candidate binding sites

get_total_reads()

Get total number of mapped reads from the idxstats file

index_fa()

Index the FASTA file, and generate a 'chrom.sizes' file

load_TOP_samples()

Load and process TOP posterior samples

merge_normalize_bin_transform_counts()

Merge counts from multiple replicates, then normalize, bin and transform the merged counts

merge_normalize_counts()

Merge counts from multiple replicates, then normalize merged counts

millipede_binning()

Perform MILLIPEDE binning on count matrix

normalize_bin_transform_counts()

Normalize, bin and transform counts

normalize_chip()

Normalize (and transform) ChIP-seq read coverage

normalize_counts()

Normalize read counts

predict_TOP()

Predict quantitative TF occupancy or TF binding probability

predict_TOP_logistic_mean_coef()

Predict TF binding probability by TOP logistic model

predict_TOP_mean_coef()

Predict TF occupancy using posterior mean of regression coefficients

predict_TOP_samples()

Predict TF occupancy using posterior samples of regression coefficients

process_candidate_sites()

Obtain and filter candidate sites from FIMO result

scatterplot()

Simple x-y scatter plot

scatterplot_predictions()

Scatter plot of measured and predicted occupancy

select_features()

Select PWM and DNase (or ATAC) bin features from the input data frame

select_model_coef_level()

Select regression coefficients by the TOP hierarchy level

Contents

Developed by Kaixuan Luo, Jianling Zhong, Alex Hartemink.
